subject: I bought your pedals and they don't work.
description_text:
Hello, I purchased your pedals on the Ozon marketplace here -
https://www.ozon.ru/product/simsonn-new-pro-x-ultra-p2-h2-1-pedali-gonochnogo-simulyatora-dlya-pkg-idravlicheskaya-pedal-1754932771/?from=share_android&perehod=smm_share_button_productpage_link
I waited for about three weeks, and yesterday I connected it, but the gas
pedal doesn't work. I tried updating the firmware, uninstalling and
reinstalling the drivers, but nothing helped. I think the sensor is
defective, and I can't calibrate it because the gas pedal is completely
dead. However, the brake pedal works fine. Additionally, the gas pedal's
light barely works on the left side, but it doesn't work at all on the
right side. Here are some photos and videos:

conversations.body_text: Hi Евгений Федотов,    Please check whether the small black spring clip at the throttle’s blue limiter position is damaged. In addition, try swapping the throttle and clutch to confirm. If it is indeed damaged, we will send you a new throttle sensor as a replacement.

Hello, can you please tell me the pattern where this black spring
retainer is on the blue stopper?


чт, 2 окт. 2025 г., 15:23 service@simsonn.com

Yes, this spring is worth it, but nothing has changed. Sometimes when you
press the brake, 1-2 percent of the gas pressure appears... I tried the
same thing in the clutch connector... On the marketplace, the seller
offered compensation of 30% of the cost, which is generally ridiculous.
What good does it do me if I can't ride the old moz pedals, I sold them. I
was sure that when I get these I will ride. This sensor itself is not
working, defective, I think I've tried everything. If I refuse
compensation, I will have to return them and wait for an unknown amount of
time...



пт, 3 окт. 2025 г., 12:12 service@simsonn.com

Hi Евгений Федотов,    Please first make sure that all pedals are properly connected to the control box, then unplug and reconnect the USB cable. Next, open Simsonn Manager and use the Offset function. A settings window will pop up, allowing you to adjust the initial signal position of the pedals. This function is typically used after replacing the control box or adjusting the pedal spring positions for initial calibration.

I've done all this already, nothing helps...



сб, 4 окт. 2025 г., 06:03 service@simsonn.com

Hi Евгений Федотов,     Please uninstall the old version from your computer first, then reinstall version 2.1.2 and update the firmware. After the update, the device version should display as CPU1: 2.0.5, CPU2: 2.0.3. If the issue still persists, we will send you a replacement sensor.   https://drive.google.com/file/d/1PZwHUqhhmJw0IBGDO8mGONPbrICJU3z1/view?usp=drive_link
